name: Final Draft AV Script
summary: Learn about .AV files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The AV file is the main file used by version 1 of Final Draft AV to store scripts. AV files were replaced by XAV files with the release of version 2 of Final Draft AV.
To save the AV file in Final Draft AV, select File → Save or Save As and choose the AV file type. To open the AV file in Final Draft AV, select File → Open and choose the AV file type.
NOTE: Final Draft AV has been discontinued and is no longer available to download.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
